name: Zigzacube
description:
A fun game that you can play with your friends :) Do not let your cube touch the zigzag walls or else he/she die. Make your best score and earn reward points to customize your avatar like cubes etc. on the shop. Earn trophies and compete your best score w/ the other players. LET THE FUN ZIGZACUBE BEGIN!

Controls & Instructions:
*Left Click

-if the cube is going left, left click to change the cube direction to right.
-if the cube is going right, left click to change the cube direction to left.
It means Alternate only

I will keep you updated :)
Cheers :D
~HJ
